data.title: Responsible Muslims and Normalizing Islam: Dutch Muslims and the Politics of Responsibility
meta_keywords: Implicit Religion; Religion; Spirituality; belief; church attendance; deconstruction; ethics; myth; sacred; science fiction; secularism; secularization; sociology of religion;theology
